comment: Good Game. And BGMusic is Good
worth it for the bus stop seal theme alone

This is a hybrid of a farm managing game with crafts and all that, merged with an open world adventure game done in a side scroll (2D) platforming engine. You do quests while managing your resources and buildings as well as fulfilling the needs of the passengers on your ship... and at the same time, doing parkours in events and such similar to most platformers.
When the game was first announced, I remember talking to my friend and saying that This looks cool, I'll keep an eye on it

This game is definitely worth it! It's one hell of an emotional roller coaster, both with an amazing story and unique characters that just rope you in. Not only that, but you also get a big ass boat! A great deal if you ask me!!
Slows down a bit towards the end but still excellent & one of the best games I've ever played
Spiritfarer is a 2020 management game developed by Thunder Lotus, previously known for their hand-animated games consisting of Jotun and Sundered.
Prop Hunt but good. It's a great game to play with on stream with friends and is absolutely bursting with a charming aesthetic.
